column4: im trying to do a apt-get update, but i get this error: Failed to fetch http://no.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/edgy-updates/main/source/Sources.bz2  MD5Sum mismatch
sound like the repos is broken atm, try again later. should not be more than a day.
the repos was updated today at 11:15 (1,5 hours ago) maybe something went wrong
